Ok, like I said before, I'm new to this group, so I was just curious, are 
you talking about a gladiator tournament? If so, how are you going to work 
it? Do you have someone coding a way to let gladiator be played on the 
internet? There are too many messages for me to go back and try reading them 
all to catch up, so if someone could just sum up everything important I've 
missed that be helpful.

                       -Wes
